ygData.subject: Re: Bards vs Clerics in melee
ygData.msgSnippet: ... An interesting note on this. A friend of mine plays a dwarf cleric and dueled a L40 warrior back when he was L35 (it was not a friendly duel) He won,
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, Sep 28/99, "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...> wrote:
> From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
>
> The dark elf was stupid. Smiting you was a total waste of his mana unless
> his smites alone could kill you which he should have known they could not.
> Try that against a dwarf cleric who knows waht he's doing and you will die.
> especially now that he can root you and you can't interrupt his healing when
> he backs away.

An interesting note on this. A friend of mine plays a dwarf cleric and
dueled a L40 warrior back when he was L35 (it was not a friendly duel)
He won, though one of the warrior's buddys used LoH on the warrior
before he actually killed him.
